```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
```

## pivot longer

Load the PULSE data

```{r}
pulse_df = 
  read_sas("data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

Let's try to pivot

```{r}
pulse_tidy = 
  pulse_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_", 
    values_to = "bdi"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    visit = replace(visit, visit == "bl", "00m"),
    visit = factor(visit)
  )
```
